sys_ui_page.html: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null"> Do you want to change state? <button id="cancelpage" onclick="cancelPage();">Cancel</button> <button id="okpage" onclick="okPage();">OK</button> </j:jelly>
